name: SickleCellAnemiaAndHBSDiseaseCN_HD_ICD10
title: Sickle cell Anemia and HB S Disease CN_HD_ICD10
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Flu Vaccine - Adult & Pneumococcal Vaccine - Adult Care Need.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute Flu Vaccine - Adult /& Pneumococcal Vaccine - Adult Care Need for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: Flu Vaccine - Adult & Pneumococcal Vaccine - Adult Care Need for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: Bone Marrow Transplant Codes that constitute the Flu Vaccine - Adult & Pneumococcal Vaccine - Adult Care Need for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
